content: next 2 double_crochet s of the last round from here on this is abbreviated as 2/4/6/8 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 2 double_crochet puff wheat granny square | @riiksberg | 9 3 2024 page 1 2 into double_crochet 2 chain 2 puff st in between the next two puff stiches of the last round* repeat *-* 2 times 2 chain 2 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 2 double_crochet into double_crochet the first might be hidden under the double_crochet s you just made 2 chain puff st in the same space as the first puff st of this round slip_stitch into puff st round 6 lch puff st in between the the first and last puff stiches of the last round *2 chain 4 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 4 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 chain 2 puff st in between the next two puff stiches of the last round* repeat *-* 2 times 2 chain 4 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 4 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 chain puff st in the same space as the first puff st of this round slip_stitch into puff st round 7 lch puff st in between the the first and last puff stiches of the last round *2 chain 6 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 6 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 chain 2 puff st in between the next two puff stiches of the last round* repeat *-* 2 times 2 chain 6 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 6 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 chain puff st in the same space as the first puff st of this round slip_stitch into puff st round 8 lch puff st in between the the first and last puff stiches of the last round *3 chain 8 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 8 double_crochet into double_crochet 3 chain puff st in between the next two puff stiches of the last round* repeat *-* 2 times 3 chain 8 double_crochet into double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet into ch2 space 8 double_crochet into double_crochet 3 chain slip_stitch into puff st cut yarn and pull through the last loop on the hook the square is now finished feedback and tagging how clear were the instructions for you how long did it take for you to make the square what size was the finished square how difficult would you rate the pattern very easy very difficult send your feedback ask clarifying questions and please report any errors in the pattern to riiksberg@gmail com if you publish images of your finished pieces please tag me with @riiksberg happy crocheting puff wheat granny square | @riiksberg | 9 3 2024 page 2 2
